entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
